Curriculum

  1. Foundations: opportunity selection, value props, competitive research, lean validation.
  2. Build: architecture, UI kits, integrating LLMs, reliable prompts, rate limiting, monitoring.
  3. Sell: pricing, packaging, Stripe Checkout, onboarding, retaining customers.
  4. Traffic: SEO for AI tools, content strategy, partnerships, directories.
  5. Scale: analytics, iteration cadence, automation, hiring contractors.

How we work

  1. Audit & focus: define your niche, outcome, and offer.
  2. Build fast: assemble a product with our blueprints.
  3. Launch & learn: ship, measure, iterate weekly.
  4. Scale: add channels, pricing tests, and ops.
